item.title: Defining a Roadmap
item.description: The roadmap is under development. Contributions are welcomed via our github repository.

item.title: Ways You Can Contribute
item.description: Coders: Help us build the infrastructure to get more people posters by contributing pull requests to our repository on a new branch, and addressing issues that hinder our progress. Everyone: Invite people you know to join our Telegram Channel where they can get updates from us as things progress. Contribute Information about legal funds, trade organizations, and Non-Profits collaborating in the fight against vaccine mandates by using our form (pending).

item.title: Code & Content Contribution Guidelines
item.description: These guidelines are under development. Contributions are welcomed via our github repository.

item.title: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) and Crypto's Future For the Music Industry
item.description: One of the biggest critiques I’ve encountered from bearish investors like Peter Schiff regarding Bitcoin and Cryptocurrencies as a whole is that it’s intangible. The internet itself is intangible in the same sense, yet everyone uses it without thinking of the hardware, network layers, and other protocols that facilitate everything we do online. No one calls it a fad anymore, but they used to as well. Blockchain technology will progress in a similar fashion, and Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) are a new value proposition that ties the tech to a swath of new real-world use cases, and music industry is only one facet of this upcoming economic boom.
